name: You Gotta Buy Everything
description:
You Gotta buy everything is a top -down shooter, but you start with nothing, no player character, no levels, no sprites, no audio, and no GUI. You gotta make money and buy them first. Earn as many coins as you can and buy all the features that make a game a game. 

The game includes 3 different randomly generated areas and 50+ different upgrades to purchase and a lot of things to break open for coins.
